# buildBlock(_:)

**Type Method**

Combines statement blocks into a single product.

## Declaration

```swift
static func buildBlock(_ components: any DataInsertable...) -> any DataInsertable
```

## Result builder methods

- **buildArray(_:)**: Enables support for `for..in` loops.
- **buildEither(first:)**: Enables support for `if-else` and `switch` constructs.
- **buildEither(second:)**: Enables support for `if-else` and `switch` constructs.
- **buildOptional(_:)**: Enables support for `if` statements that do not have an `else` clause.

items.description: Enables support for `if` statements that do not have an `else` clause.
